body: In the end, she was low key a slut but that could have changed if she had a better husband tbh. At the end of the day, both were pieces of shit I guess
she is bitch

…to being her sidedick. Wife grows a spine and calls her husband out on having a mistress, so she cucks him right in front of him and the two finally get a divorce and she’s free to fuck as she pleases.

So the husband had been cheating on the wife for a long time, wife gets tired of being a sexless housewife and falls for daughter’s fiancé, and the fiancé all ready wanted the wife so he starts fucking her. This continues when eventually the daughter catches them and gets turned on because she has a mom fetish or something, and she decides to get perverted and bring her mom along for the ride with the help of her friend’s dad. This continues, mom gets suspicious of daughter, so daughter decides enough is enough and reveals everyone’s secrets to each other, mom accepts and things continue. Daughter decides to study abroad and become a lesbian while at home her fiancé gets tired of fucking her mom so friend’s dad becomes the rebound guy. Mom discovers she’s pregnant with fiancé’s kid, so friend’s dad helps her get an abortion, and eventually starts fucking her. Fiancé comes crawling back because he realizes he got rid of the only pussy he had, only to find out that he demoted himself…
So she just wanted to become a loose woman, the daughter all over the place old men/women even sorta cucking man she wildin

I'm read a lot in Reddit most woman like this end up having no one to talk to in their later age , get depressed and regret , mostly dying alone and even their funeral or grave is not allowed to be near to their family.

Fuck NTR why I'm reading this
so the final hero is hideaki san ...who got to fck both wife and daughter.......what more they both think they are living life to fullest infact they were just being manipulated

The plot really became disengaging from the 2nd volume. Jst scrolled through most of them...
Kinda disappointed to be honest.
What a pathetic husband,give her divorce already
Wtf... What kind of family is that

Basically the wife's just a slut
Confusing and bittersweet like real life :/
Eh, that really wasn't tsuyatsuya's greatest work... and definitely wasn't worth 3 whole volumes.

What dumb family, they're just trying to convince themselves that they're mature adults who thinks "I'm slutty because I've always wanted to be one, and that that makes me an adult" I get that vibe mostly from the dumb daughter. The idiots was been manipulated. What a dumb ending.
10/10 thanks tsuya. .
It's three volumes u moron not three chapters
Can someone tell me the tldr version of the story ? As much as I enjoy NTR, I don't really like a long story since it's a freakin 3 chaps :(
As much as I like tsuyatsuya this is one of his worst works he could have told the whole thing in one volume instead of spreading it to three volumes
